nodes.description: 叙利亚民主力量（SDF）培养摩尔的情报合作
nodes.support_text: SDF leader Gen. Mazloum Abdi told NBC News on Monday that one of his organization’s informants had helped lead the Americans to Baghdadi’s compound

nodes.description: 摩尔被移交美国情报部门并接受多周背景审查
nodes.support_text: SDF leaders then handed control of the agent to U.S. intelligence operatives, who spent weeks vetting him until they were sure he was genuine

nodes.description: 美国官员确认摩尔提供关键情报但多次行动计划被取消
nodes.support_text: One U.S. official said he was a Sunni Arab who turned against the Islamic State because one of his relatives had been killed by the group

nodes.description: 夏季启动长达数月的情报突破行动
nodes.support_text: A months-long effort to exploit the intelligence breakthrough began in the summer

nodes.description: 突袭前最后一个月确认摩尔情报有效性
nodes.support_text: It was assessed for quite a while that the person might have the key to the lock... That only really seriously became clear within the last couple of weeks

nodes.description: 2023年10月26日美军突袭巴里沙镇ISIS据点
nodes.support_text: The mole’s detailed knowledge... proved to be critical in the Oct. 26 raid that ended with the death of the world’s most-wanted terrorist

nodes.description: 摩尔的线人情报帮助锁定巴里沙镇高安全系数的地下 compound
nodes.support_text: The informant’s tips lead to an opportunity to act... the focus of the manhunt shifted to Idlib over the summer... U.S. officials narrowed their focus to the town of Barisha

nodes.description: Delta Force与75th Ranger Regiment联合突击队实施突袭
nodes.support_text: The assault force surrounded the compound and did a 'call out'... Baghdadi remained inside, fleeing with three of his children into the tunnel

nodes.description: 军犬追击导致ISIS头目引爆自杀背心
nodes.support_text: The dogs chased the militant leader as he tried to flee... Baghdadi detonated his suicide belt after one of the U.S. team’s military dogs charged him

nodes.description: 摩尔的线人情报包含Baghdadi携带自杀背心等关键细节
nodes.support_text: The informant provided essential personal details about the reclusive terrorist leader, including the fact that he always traveled with a suicide belt

nodes.description: 突袭后摩尔及其家人撤离叙利亚
nodes.support_text: The informant was exfiltrated from the region two days later with his family

nodes.description: 通过现场DNA测试和物证确认Baghdadi身份
nodes.support_text: personal items, including underwear, were taken from the compound for DNA testing to confirm Baghdadi’s presence in the building

nodes.description: SDF承认其线人参与突袭并提取DNA样本
nodes.support_text: SDF leader Gen. Mazloum Abdi told NBC News on Monday that one of his organization’s informants had helped lead the Americans to Baghdadi’s compound

nodes.description: 美军高层回避SDF直接参与并强调为纯美军行动
nodes.support_text: I’m not going to comment on what may or may not have happened with the SDF on the objective... The actions on the objective... was a U.S.-only operation
